drop table if exists Fruit CASCADE Hibernate:
drop sequence if exists FRUIT_SEQ Hibernate: create sequence FRUIT_SEQ start with 1 increment by 50 Hibernate:
create table Fruit ( id integer not null, name varchar(255), season varchar(255), primary key (id) ) Hibernate: insert into fruit (id,name,season) VALUES ( FRUIT_SEQ.NEXTVAL , 'Cherry' , 'Summer' ) Hibernate: insert into fruit (id,name,season) VALUES ( FRUIT_SEQ.NEXTVAL , 'Apple' , 'Fall' ) Hibernate: insert into fruit (id,name,season) VALUES ( FRUIT_SEQ.NEXTVAL , 'Banana' , 'Summer' )
